title: Malaysian Island Pool Villa Hideaway with All-Inclusive Dining & Nightly Drinks
description:
Set your watch to island time and be the star of your own tropical adventure at the secluded Borneo Eagle Resort, a boutique hideaway on the lush island of Pulau Tiga in Malaysia, just off the coast of Borneo. Embrace the laid-back vibes of this serene destination and explore verdant rainforests, colourful coral reefs and white-sand shores. A unique selling point: the tropical island featured on the first season of reality TV show 'Survivor'. Pulau Tiga is easily reached from mainland Borneo, with return speedboat and airport transfers included in your package.

Stay in a palatial Pool Villa, complete with a private pool and an open-deck balcony overlooking the sea, all while enjoying all-inclusive dining - daily breakfast, lunch and dinner - nightly cocktails, a daily replenished minibar with soft drinks and beers, return speedboat transfers, return airport transfers, a 60-minute massage per person, unlimited use of non-motorised watersports equipment, and complimentary Wi-Fi.

⏱**Buy now, book later**: Secure this deal now and choose your travel dates when you're ready (see Fine Print for details).
offer_address: Borneo Eagle Resort Pulau Tiga Kuala Penyu, 89740 Kota Kinabalu, Sabah, Malaysia
